channel.title: Optimism on mental excess.
channel.description: Recent content in Optimism on mental excess.

item.title: My Drive Revived.
item.description: I’ve rediscovered my love for discussing society, incentives, structures, and philosophy that I encountered most while at college. And it made me realize, I can’t just listen and reflect upon the ills of society. The problems aren’t hypothetical â€” they involve real people that face these issues each day. Perhaps I can’t change the world, but I believe I can effect change locally. On the other hand, maybe dreaming big is worthwhile, because I should wring out any potential from the future I may have.
